entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Prince Rupert
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:46 AM PST Wednesday 01 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Cloudy, 3.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Prince Rupert Airport 1:19 PM PST Wednesday 01 March 2023
Condition: Cloudy
Temperature: 3.8°C
Pressure: 99.5 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 75 %
Dewpoint: -0.2°C
Wind: SE 55 km/h gust 74 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday: Rain mixed with snow. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Snow mixed with rain changing to rain mixed with snow this afternoon. Wind southeast 40 km/h gusting to 60 except 80 gusting to 100 over exposed coastal sections. High plus 4. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Wednesday 01 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Rain mixed with snow. Low plus 2.
entry.summary: Rain. Rain mixed with snow early this evening. Rainfall amount 10 to 20 mm. Wind southeast 40 km/h gusting to 60 except 80 gusting to 100 over exposed coastal sections early this evening. Wind becoming west 30 gusting to 50 this evening. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Wednesday 01 March 2023
